com.mpos.lottery.te.merchant.service.commission

接口 CommissionBalanceService

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractCommissionBalanceService, CashoutMobileCommissionBalanceService, PayoutCommissionBalanceService, PlayerTopupCommissionBalanceService, SaleCommissionBalanceService

    public interface CommissionBalanceService

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void calCommission(Context<?> respCtx, java.lang.Object operatorOrMerchant)
      Calculate the commission and generate balance logs for a successful transaction.
      void cancelCommission(Context<?> respCtx, Transaction targetTrans, java.lang.Object operatorOrMerchant)
      Reversal operation of calCommission(Context, Object).

    • 方法详细资料

      • calCommission

        void calCommission(Context<?> respCtx,
                 java.lang.Object operatorOrMerchant)
                   throws ApplicationException
        Calculate the commission and generate balance logs for a successful transaction. This service will only calculate the commission of operator. If the credit type of operator is 'use parent', a balance log will be generated for the parent merchant whose credit type is 'definite value' as well.
        参数:
        respCtx - The transaction context. The following components must be set: respCtx.transaction.operatorId,respCtx.transaction.merchantId,respCtx.transaction.gameId
        operatorOrMerchant - THe operator or merchant(use parent) on which the balance is done.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - If encounter any business exception.

      • cancelCommission

        void cancelCommission(Context<?> respCtx,
                    Transaction targetTrans,
                    java.lang.Object operatorOrMerchant)
                      throws ApplicationException
        Reversal operation of calCommission(Context, Object). It will simply lookup all balance logs of original transaction, and restore the commission balance of operator/merchant, and mark all balances logs as cancelled.
        参数:
        respCtx - The transaction context.
        targetTrans - The transaction which is cancelled.
        operatorOrMerchant - THe operator or merchant(use parent) on which the balance is done.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - If encounter any business exception.
